## News Review for silverfast

# SilverFast Technology News Review

## Executive Summary

SilverFast continues to maintain its position in the professional film scanning market through strategic OEM partnerships, with its technology prominently featured in Plustek's new OpticFilm 135i Ai scanner priced at $759.05. The partnership showcases SilverFast's infrared Smart Removal of Defects (iSRD) technology and bundles the complete SilverFast Ai Studio 9 software suite, demonstrating the company's established role as a premium scanning software provider for professional film digitization applications through hardware manufacturer relationships rather than direct consumer sales.

## Key Developments

**Product Integration and Partnerships**
- SilverFast's infrared Smart Removal of Defects (iSRD) technology integrated into [Plustek's OpticFilm 135i Ai scanner](https://the-gadgeteer.com/2025/10/08/plustek-opticfilm-135i-ai-scanner-time-to-digitize-all-your-film-and-slides-using-the-latest-tech/)
- SilverFast Ai Studio 9 software bundled as the flagship scanning solution with the new scanner hardware
- The partnership reinforces SilverFast's OEM distribution strategy in the professional scanning equipment market

**Technical Capabilities**
- SilverFast Ai Studio 9 offers [professional-grade features including calibrated color profiles, 48-bit color depth processing, and specialized Kodachrome film support](https://uk.pcmag.com/scanners/160429/plustek-opticfilm-135i-ai)
- The software includes [multi-layer processing architecture, IT8 target calibration support, and job management systems](https://me.pcmag.com/en/scanners/32623/plustek-opticfilm-135i-ai)
- iSRD technology uses infrared channels to automatically remove dust and scratches from film scans, reducing manual post-processing requirements

## Market Context

SilverFast's presence in the professional film digitization market reflects the continued demand for high-end scanning solutions despite the digital photography era. The company's strategy of partnering with hardware manufacturers like Plustek positions it as an established software provider in a specialized market segment. Rather than competing directly in consumer markets, SilverFast maintains its market presence through OEM relationships that bundle its professional-grade software with premium scanning hardware, targeting users who require advanced color management and film-specific processing capabilities.

## Notable Quotes

No executive quotes or analyst statements were available in the source materials reviewed.

## Strategic Implications

SilverFast's partnership strategy with hardware manufacturers demonstrates a focused approach to market presence in the specialized film scanning segment. By positioning itself as the premium software solution bundled with professional-grade scanners, the company maintains relevance in a niche but stable market. The technical sophistication of SilverFast Ai Studio 9, including features like calibrated color spaces and specialized Kodachrome processing, suggests the company continues to invest in advanced capabilities that differentiate it from basic scanning software alternatives. This OEM partnership model provides SilverFast with distribution channels while allowing hardware manufacturers to offer comprehensive professional solutions, indicating a sustainable business approach in the film digitization market.

## Summary

SilverFast Ai Studio 9 is bundled with the Plustek OpticFilm 135i Ai scanner as the flagship scanning software, offering professional-grade features including calibrated color profiles, 48-bit color depth processing, specialized Kodachrome film support, and multi-layer processing architecture with automated dust removal and color correction capabilities, positioning SilverFast as a premium solution in the film digitization market.

### Article 3: Plustek OpticFilm 135i Ai

**Source:** [View Full Article](https://me.pcmag.com/en/scanners/32623/plustek-opticfilm-135i-ai)

## Summary

SilverFast Ai Studio 9 is bundled with the Plustek OpticFilm 135i Ai scanner as the flagship scanning software, providing professional-grade features including calibrated color space, multi-layer processing architecture, and specialized tools for Kodachrome film processing. The software includes IT8 target calibration support, job management systems, and professional analysis tools such as gradation curves and histograms, positioning SilverFast as a premium solution in the film digitization market through strategic hardware partnerships.
